trans-unit.source: Control overall size of the Axes3D in the figure.

trans-unit.source: Control points of the Bezier segment. See BezierSegment.
trans-unit.target: 贝塞尔曲线段的控制点。参见 BezierSegment 。

trans-unit.source: Control the alpha transparency of the legend's background. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.framealpha"]. If shadow is activated and framealpha is None, the default value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 控制图例背景的Alpha透明度。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.framealpha"] 获取值。如果激活了阴影并且framealpha为 None ，那么将忽略默认值。

trans-unit.source: Control the default spacing between subplots.
trans-unit.target: 控制子图之间的默认间距。

trans-unit.source: Control the legend's background color. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.facecolor"]. If "inherit", it will take rcParams["axes.facecolor"].
trans-unit.target: 控制图例的背景色。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.facecolor"] 获取值。如果为 "inherit" ，它将采用 rcParams["axes.facecolor"] 。

trans-unit.source: Control the legend's background patch edge color. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.edgecolor"] If "inherit", it will take rcParams["axes.edgecolor"].
trans-unit.target: 控制图例的背景色块边缘颜色。默认值为 None ，它将取自 rcParams["legend.edgecolor"] 的值；如果是 "inherit" ，则取 rcParams["axes.edgecolor"] 。

trans-unit.source: Control whether round edges should be enabled around the FancyBboxPatch which makes up the legend's background. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.fancybox"].
trans-unit.target: 控制是否应在构成图例背景的 FancyBboxPatch 周围启用圆形边缘。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.fancybox"] 获取值。

trans-unit.source: Control whether round edges should be enabled around the FancyBboxPatch which makes up the legend's background. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.fancybox"].
trans-unit.target: 控制是否应在构成图例背景的 FancyBboxPatch 周围启用圆形边缘。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.fancybox"] 获取值。

trans-unit.source: Control whether the legend should be drawn on a patch (frame). Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.frameon"].
trans-unit.target: 控制是否应在图块（框架）上绘制图例。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.frameon"] 获取值。

trans-unit.source: Control whether to draw a shadow behind the legend. Default is None, which will take the value from rcParams["legend.shadow"].
trans-unit.target: 控制是否在图例后面绘制阴影。默认值为 None ，它将从 rcParams["legend.shadow"] 获取值。

trans-unit.source: Controls the aspect ratio of the axes. The aspect is of particular relevance for images since it may distort the image, i.e. pixel will not be square.
trans-unit.target: 控制轴的纵横比。长宽比对图像特别重要,因为它可能会使图像变形,即像素不会是正方形。

trans-unit.source: Controls the closeness of streamlines. When density = 1, the domain is divided into a 30x30 grid. density linearly scales this grid. Each cell in the grid can have, at most, one traversing streamline. For different densities in each direction, use a tuple (density_x, density_y).
trans-unit.target: 控制流线的紧密度。当 density = 1 ，将域划分为30x30的网格。密度线性缩放此网格。网格中的每个像元最多只能有一个遍历流线。对于每个方向上的不同密度，请使用元组（density_x，density_y）。

trans-unit.source: Controls the direction of the event collections:
trans-unit.target: 控制事件集合的方向。

trans-unit.source: Controls the dots per inch for the movie frames. This combined with the figure's size in inches controls the size of the movie. If None, defaults to rcParams["savefig.dpi"].
trans-unit.target: 控制影片帧的每英寸点数。结合以英寸为单位的图形尺寸，可以控制影片的尺寸。如果为 None ，则默认为 rcParams["savefig.dpi"] 。

trans-unit.source: Controls the dots per inch for the movie frames. Together with the figure's size in inches, this controls the size of the movie.
trans-unit.target: 控制电影帧的每英寸点数。与人物的尺寸(英寸)一起控制电影的大小。

trans-unit.source: Controls the font size of the legend. If the value is numeric the size will be the absolute font size in points. String values are relative to the current default font size. This argument is only used if prop is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 控制图例的字体大小。如果该值为数字，则大小将是绝对字体大小（以磅为单位）。字符串值是相对于当前默认字体大小的。仅当未指定 prop 时才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether blitting is used to optimize drawing. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否使用批注来优化图形。默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether blitting is used to optimize drawing. Note: when using blitting any animated artists will be drawn according to their zorder. However, they will be drawn on top of any previous artists, regardless of their zorder. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否使用批注来优化图形。注意：使用blitting时，将根据其zorder绘制任何动画艺术家。但是，无论它们的顺序如何，它们都将在以前的所有艺术家之上绘制。默认为False。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether frame data is cached. Defaults to True. Disabling cache might be helpful when frames contain large objects.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否缓存帧数据。默认为True。当框架包含大对象时，禁用缓存可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the animation should repeat when the sequence of frames is completed. Defaults to True.
trans-unit.target: 控制在完成帧序列后是否应重复动画。默认为 True 。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the animation should repeat when the sequence of frames is completed. Defaults to True.

trans-unit.target: 用于简单的轴视图自动缩放的方便方法,它开启或关闭自动缩放,然后,如果任一轴的自动缩放为开启,则在指定的轴上执行自动缩放。它打开或关闭自动缩放功能,然后,如果任一轴的自动缩放功能打开,它将在指定的轴上执行自动缩放。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for simple axis view autoscaling. See matplotlib.axes.Axes.autoscale() for full explanation. Note that this function behaves the same, but for all three axes. Therefore, 'z' can be passed for axis, and 'both' applies to all three axes.

trans-unit.source: Creates a piecewise continuous quadratic Bezier path between two points. The path can have two passing-through points, a point placed at the distance of armA and angle of angleA from point A, another point with respect to point B. The edges are rounded with rad.
trans-unit.target: 在两个点之间创建分段的连续二次Bezier路径。该路径可以有两个通过点，一个通过点位于armA的距离处，并且与点A的夹角为A，另一个点相对于点B。边沿用rad倒圆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a piecewise continuous quadratic Bezier path between two points. The path has a one passing-through point placed at the intersecting point of two lines which cross the start and end point, and have a slope of angleA and angleB, respectively. The connecting edges are rounded with rad.
trans-unit.target: 在两个点之间创建分段的连续二次Bezier路径。该路径具有一个通过点，该通过点位于与起点和终点相交的两条线的相交点处，并且分别具有角度A和angleB的斜率。连接边缘用rad倒圆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a simple quadratic Bezier curve between two points. The curve is created so that the middle control point (C1) is located at the same distance from the start (C0) and end points(C2) and the distance of the C1 to the line connecting C0-C2 is rad times the distance of C0-C2.
trans-unit.target: 在两个点之间创建简单的二次贝塞尔曲线。创建曲线以使中间控制点（C1）与起点（C0）和终点（C2）处于相同距离，并且C1到连接C0-C2的线的距离为rad乘以距离C0-C2。

trans-unit.source: Creates a simple quadratic Bezier curve between two points. The middle control points is placed at the intersecting point of two lines which cross the start and end point, and have a slope of angleA and angleB, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在两点之间创建一条简单的二次元贝塞尔曲线。中间的控制点放在两条线的交点上,这两条线的起点和终点相交,斜率分别为角度A和角度B。

trans-unit.source: Date ticklabels often overlap, so it is useful to rotate them and right align them. Also, a common use case is a number of subplots with shared xaxes where the x-axis is date data. The ticklabels are often long, and it helps to rotate them on the bottom subplot and turn them off on other subplots, as well as turn off xlabels.
trans-unit.target: 日期刻度线经常会重叠,因此旋转它们并对它们进行右对齐是很有用的。此外,一个常见的使用情况是一些子图与共享的xaxes,其中x轴是日期数据。Ticklabels 通常较长,旋转底部子图上的 ticklabels 并关闭其他子图上的 ticklabels,以及关闭 xlabels,都是有帮助的。

In case those are not specified or None, the marker color is determined by the next color of the Axes' current "shape and fill" color cycle. This cycle defaults to rcParams["axes.prop_cycle"] (default: cycler('color', ['#1f77b4', '#ff7f0e', '#2ca02c', '#d62728', '#9467bd', '#8c564b', '#e377c2', '#7f7f7f', '#bcbd22', '#17becf'])).

trans-unit.source: Define step if the filling should be a step function, i.e. constant in between y. The value determines where the step will occur:

trans-unit.source: Define where to exclude some horizontal regions from being filled. The filled regions are defined by the coordinates x[where]. More precisely, fill between x[i] and x[i+1] if where[i] and where[i+1]. Note that this definition implies that an isolated True value between two False values in where will not result in filling. Both sides of the True position remain unfilled due to the adjacent False values.
trans-unit.target: 定义其中从充满排除某些水平区域。填充的区域由坐标 x[where] 定义。更准确地说，如果 where[i] and where[i+1] ，则在 x[i] 和 x[i+1] 之间填充。请注意，此定义暗示在其中的两个False值之间隔离的True值不会导致填充。由于相邻的False值，True位置的两侧均未填充。

trans-unit.source: Define where to exclude some vertical regions from being filled. The filled regions are defined by the coordinates y[where]. More precisely, fill between y[i] and y[i+1] if where[i] and where[i+1]. Note that this definition implies that an isolated True value between two False values in where will not result in filling. Both sides of the True position remain unfilled due to the adjacent False values.
trans-unit.target: 定义其中从充满排除某些垂直区域。填充的区域由坐标 y[where] 定义。更准确地说，如果 where[i] and where[i+1] ，则在 y[i] 和 y[i+1] 之间填充。请注意，此定义暗示在其中的两个False值之间隔离的True值不会导致填充。由于相邻的False值，True位置的两侧均未填充。

trans-unit.source: Draws a collection of paths selecting drawing properties from the lists facecolors, edgecolors, linewidths, linestyles and antialiaseds. offsets is a list of offsets to apply to each of the paths. The offsets in offsets are first transformed by offsetTrans before being applied. offset_position may be either "screen" or "data" depending on the space that the offsets are in.

trans-unit.source: Draws a marker at each of the vertices in path. This includes all vertices, including control points on curves. To avoid that behavior, those vertices should be removed before calling this function.

trans-unit.source: Dynamically find minor tick positions based on the positions of major ticks. The scale must be linear with major ticks evenly spaced.

trans-unit.target: 每个kwarg可以是应用于所有矩形的单个参数，例如：

trans-unit.source: Each Collection can optionally be used as its own ScalarMappable by passing the norm and cmap parameters to its constructor. If the Collection's ScalarMappable matrix _A has been set (via a call to Collection.set_array), then at draw time this internal scalar mappable will be used to set the facecolors and edgecolors, ignoring those that were manually passed in.
trans-unit.target: 通过将norm和cmap参数传递给其构造函数，可以选择将每个Collection用作其自己的 ScalarMappable 。如果已经设置了Collection的 ScalarMappable 矩阵 _A （通过调用 Collection.set_array ），则在绘制时，此内部标量可映射对象将用于设置 facecolors 和 edgecolors ，而忽略那些手动传递的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Each child artist will fire a pick event if mouseevent is over the artist and the artist has picker set.
trans-unit.target: 如果mouseevent在该美术师上并且该美术师已设置了选择器，则每个子美术师将触发一个pick事件。

trans-unit.source: Each element describes a polygon as a sequence of N_i points (x, y, z).
trans-unit.target: 每个元素将一个多边形描述为 N_i 个点 (x, y, z) 的序列。

trans-unit.source: Each iteration returns a pair (vertices, code), where vertices is a sequence of 1-3 coordinate pairs, and code is a Path code.
trans-unit.target: 每次迭代返回一对 (vertices, code) ，其中 vertices 是1-3个坐标对的序列，而 code 是 Path 代码。

trans-unit.source: Each legend handle is a Line2D representing the Path that was drawn, and each label is a string what each Path represents.
trans-unit.target: 每个图例手柄是一个 Line2D ,代表绘制的路径，每个标签是每个Path表示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Each list entry a collection of artists that represent what needs to be enabled on each frame. These will be disabled for other frames.
trans-unit.target: 每个列表条目都是代表每个框架需要启用的艺术家的集合。在其他帧上,这些将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Each list entry is a collection of artists that are made visible on the corresponding frame. Other artists are made invisible.
trans-unit.target: 每个列表条目都是艺术家的集合,在相应的框架上是可见的。其他艺术家则不可见。

trans-unit.source: Each list starts with a single fresh Tick.
trans-unit.target: 每个列表都从一个新的Tick开始。

trans-unit.source: Each must have a make_image method. For each image, can_composite should return True, though this is not enforced by this function. Each image must have a purely affine transformation with no shear.
trans-unit.target: 每个都必须具有 make_image 方法。对于每个图像， can_composite 应该返回 True ，尽管此函数未强制执行此操作。每个图像必须具有纯仿射变换，且无剪切。

trans-unit.source: Each of x, height, width, and bottom may either be a scalar applying to all bars, or it may be a sequence of length N providing a separate value for each bar.
trans-unit.target: 每个X，高度，宽度，和底部可以是适用于所有条标量，或者它可以是长度为N提供用于每个条的单独值的序列。

trans-unit.source: Each of y, width, height, and left may either be a scalar applying to all bars, or it may be a sequence of length N providing a separate value for each bar.
trans-unit.target: 每个ÿ，宽度，高度，和左可以是适用于所有条标量，或者它可以是长度为N提供用于每个条的单独值的序列。

trans-unit.source: Each of four connector lines coming from the rectangle drawn on this axis, in the order lower left, upper left, lower right, upper right. Two are set with visibility to False, but the user can set the visibility to True if the automatic choice is not deemed correct.
trans-unit.target: 来自该轴上绘制的矩形的四根连接器线中的每条线，按左下，左上，右下，右上的顺序排列。将两个可见性设置为False，但是如果自动选择不正确，则用户可以将可见性设置为True。

trans-unit.source: Each of them is optional. If not provided, the value from the style cycle is used. Exception: If line is given, but no marker, the data will be a line without markers.
trans-unit.target: 它们中的每一个都是可选的。如果未提供，则使用样式周期中的值。例外：如果给定 line ，但没有 marker ，则数据将是没有marker的行。

trans-unit.source: Each polygon is defined by the lists of x and y positions of its nodes, optionally followed by a color specifier. See matplotlib.colors for supported color specifiers. The standard color cycle is used for polygons without a color specifier.
trans-unit.target: 每个多边形由其节点的x和y位置列表定义，并可以选择后面跟一个颜色说明符。有关受支持的颜色说明符，请参见 matplotlib.colors 。标准颜色循环用于没有颜色说明符的多边形。

trans-unit.source: Each rc setting is assigned a default value and a function used to validate any attempted changes to that setting. The default values and validation functions are defined in the rcsetup module, and are used to construct the rcParams global object which stores the settings and is referenced throughout matplotlib.
trans-unit.target: 每个rc设置都被分配了一个默认值和一个函数,用于验证对该设置的任何尝试性更改。默认值和验证函数在rcsetup模块中定义,并用于构造rcParams全局对象,该对象存储设置并在整个matplotlib中被引用。

trans-unit.source: Each rc setting is assigned a function used to validate any attempted changes to that setting. The validation functions are defined in the rcsetup module, and are used to construct the rcParams global object which stores the settings and is referenced throughout Matplotlib.
trans-unit.target: 每个rc设置都被分配了一个函数,用于验证对该设置的任何尝试性更改。验证函数在rcsetup模块中定义,并用于构造rcParams全局对象,该对象存储设置并在Matplotlib中引用。

trans-unit.source: Each row defines an edge by it's start point index and end point index. Each edge appears only once, i.e. for an edge between points i and j, there will only be either (i, j) or (j, i).
trans-unit.target: 每行都通过起点索引和终点索引定义一条边。每个边仅出现一次，即，对于点i和j之间的边，将仅出现（i，j）或（j，i）。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the table for a given color is a sequence of x, y0, y1 tuples. In each sequence, x must increase monotonically from 0 to 1. For any input value z falling between x[i] and x[i+1], the output value of a given color will be linearly interpolated between y1[i] and y0[i+1]:
trans-unit.target: 表中给定颜色的每一行都是x，y0，y1元组的序列。在每个序列中，x必须从0到1单调增加。对于介于x [i]和x [i + 1]之间的任何输入值z，给定颜色的输出值将在y1 [i]和y0之间线性插值[i + 1]：

trans-unit.source: Each triangle is represented by a plane so that an interpolated value at point (x, y) lies on the plane of the triangle containing (x, y). Interpolated values are therefore continuous across the triangulation, but their first derivatives are discontinuous at edges between triangles.
trans-unit.target: 每个三角形用一个平面表示,因此在点(x,y)处的内插值位于包含(x,y)的三角形的平面上。因此,内插值在整个三角形上是连续的,但在三角形之间的边缘处,其第一导数是不连续的。

trans-unit.source: Each triangle is represented by a plane so that an interpolated value at point (x,y) lies on the plane of the triangle containing (x,y). Interpolated values are therefore continuous across the triangulation, but their first derivatives are discontinuous at edges between triangles.
trans-unit.target: 每个三角形用一个平面表示,因此在点(x,y)的内插值位于包含(x,y)的三角形的平面上。因此,内插值在整个三角形上是连续的,但在三角形之间的边缘处,其第一导数是不连续的。

trans-unit.source: Each value is an event.
trans-unit.target: 每个值都是一个事件。

trans-unit.source: Each value is an event. If positions is a 2D array-like, each row corresponds to a row or a column of lines (depending on the orientation parameter).
trans-unit.target: 每个值都是一个事件。如果positions是类似2D数组的数组，则每一行对应于一行的行或一行的列（取决于方向参数）。

trans-unit.source: Either a 3-digit integer or three separate integers describing the position of the subplot. If the three integers are nrows, ncols, and index in order, the subplot will take the index position on a grid with nrows rows and ncols columns. index starts at 1 in the upper left corner and increases to the right.
trans-unit.target: 3位整数或描述子图位置的三个独立整数。如果三个整数依次为nrows，ncols和index，则子图将在具有nrows行和ncols列的网格上取得索引位置。索引从左上角的1​​开始并向右增加。

trans-unit.source: Either a scalar or a vector and sets the width of each box. The default is 0.15*(distance between extreme positions), clipped to no less than 0.15 and no more than 0.5.

trans-unit.source: Either a scalar or a vector that sets the maximal width of each violin. The default is 0.5, which uses about half of the available horizontal space.

trans-unit.source: Enable antialiasing, overriding the defaults. For filled contours, the default is True. For line contours, it is taken from rcParams["lines.antialiased"].
trans-unit.target: 启用抗锯齿功能，覆盖默认值。对于填充轮廓，默认值为True。对于线轮廓，它取自 rcParams["lines.antialiased"] 。

trans-unit.source: Enable antialiasing, overriding the defaults. For filled contours, the default is True. For line contours, it is taken from rcParams["lines.antialiased"] (default: True).
trans-unit.target: 启用抗锯齿功能，覆盖默认值。对于填充轮廓，默认值为True。对于线轮廓，它取自 rcParams["lines.antialiased"] （默认值： True ）。

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable mouse dragging support of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用鼠标拖动图例的支持。

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the back/forward button.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用后退/前进按钮。

trans-unit.source: Enable the toggle tool
trans-unit.target: 启用切换工具

trans-unit.source: Enable the toggle tool.
trans-unit.target: 启用切换工具。

trans-unit.source: Enable/disable corner masking, which only has an effect if Z is a masked array. If False, any quad touching a masked point is masked out. If True, only the triangular corners of quads nearest those points are always masked out, other triangular corners comprising three unmasked points are contoured as usual.
trans-unit.target: 启用/禁用边角遮罩，仅当Z是被遮罩的数组时才有效。如果为 False ，则任何遮罩点接触的四边形都会被遮罩。如果为 True ，则始终仅遮盖那些最靠近这些点的四边形的三角形角，而照常绘制包含三个未遮盖点的其他三角形角。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulation of a font that a DVI file can refer to.
trans-unit.target: 对DVI文件可以引用的字体进行封装。

trans-unit.source: Endpoints, expanded and/or swapped if necessary. If either input is inf or NaN, or if both inputs are 0 or very close to zero, it returns -expander, expander.
trans-unit.target: 端点，如有必要，可以扩展和/或交换。如果任何一个输入为inf或NaN，或者两个输入均为0或非常接近零，则返回-expander，expander。

trans-unit.source: Enforces the priority of a local variable over potentially conflicting argument(s) from a kwargs dict. The following possible output values are considered in order of priority:
trans-unit.target: 强制执行局部变量相对于kwargs dict中可能冲突的参数的优先级。以下可能的输出值按优先级顺序考虑。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all ticks are strictly positive. For all other tasks, it delegates to the base Locator (which may be different depending on the scale of the r-axis.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有刻度线都严格为正。对于所有其他任务，它委派给基本 Locator （根据r轴的比例可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Enter "raster" mode. All subsequent drawing commands (until stop_rasterizing is called) will be drawn with the raster backend.

trans-unit.source: Enter "raster" mode. All subsequent drawing commands (until stop_rasterizing is called) will be drawn with the raster backend.

trans-unit.source: Entry in the layout to mean "leave this space empty". Defaults to '.'. Note, if layout is a string, it is processed via inspect.cleandoc to remove leading white space, which may interfere with using white-space as the empty sentinel.
trans-unit.target: 在布局中输入的意思是“将此空间留空”。默认为 '.' 。请注意，如果layout是字符串，则将通过 inspect.cleandoc 对其进行处理，以删除前导空白，这可能会干扰将空白用作空前哨。
